nodes.text: Join the SAGroup was an Imperial propaganda poster designed to persuade young people into joining the COMPNOR's Sub-Adult Group. Based on a concept by Minister of Information Pollux Hax, it was created by the cyborg artist Vanya Sha. The poster depicted a group of stormtroopers in their white armors, a line of identical-looking youths wearing black military uniforms, and a large red banner bearing the Imperial crest. The poster's title, which doubled as a slogan, was written in Aurebesh at its bottom.

Drawn by Marko Manev, Join the SAGroup is one of the many illustrations featured in Pablo Hidalgo's reference book Star Wars Propaganda: A History of Persuasive Art in the Galaxy, which was published on October 25, 2016.
